properties.name: validator.setting.enable-strict-mode
properties.description: Whether to enable strict mode, the default is loose mode.

properties.name: validator.setting.enable-single-mode
properties.description: Whether to enable single verification mode. If it is enabled, all illegal parameters will not be verified. The default mode is loose mode.

properties.name: validator.setting.enable-warning-log
properties.description: Whether to enable warning log printing. It is enabled by default.

properties.name: validator.setting.default-language
properties.description: Set the default locale to use, the current system locale is used by default.

properties.name: validator.setting.handlers
properties.description:
Register custom validation handler, the parameter is the full class path of the package, and multiple ones can be separated by (,; 	
).
